title: October 26, 2019: Zilliqa (ZIL): Up 10.03%
text:
Zilliqa Price Update

Zilliqa is up by approximately 10.03% from the previous day, with its price currently hovering around $0.005352 USD. Yesterday’s up day is a reversal of the day before it; in terms of trend, though, note that the current price is now 1.75% below its 20 day moving average, and is currently in a down trend over the past 14 days. Zilliqa’s expected trading range — as forecasted by the Bollinger bands indicator, which determines a range based on momentum and volatility over the past two weeks — is between $0.004839 and $0.006055. As we are closer to the bottom of that range, rangebound traders may wish to consider exploring buying opportunities.

Trade Zilliqa (ZIL) and over 500 other cryptos across ten different exchanges — all from one app. Try Quadency.

The market capitalization of Zilliqa, or the amount of US dollars it would take to buy up all the circulating coins, is currently estimated to be $46 million.

Daily Engagement Metrics Update

Yesterday saw 16 transfers amongst holders of Zilliqa. Regarding a tally of holders, Yesterday saw Zilliqa’s wallet count decline by 0. Our engagement rank, which combines weekly percentage growth in number of holders and number of transfers, has Zilliqa ranked 31 out of the 34 Ethereum tokens we’re tracking.

Observing Zilliqa’s Richest Wallets

Of the coin’s total money supply, the richest 1,0000 wallets currently own 98.14%. Drilling down to just exchanges, the top 1,000 wallets that are exchanges control 3.9% of the currency’s money supply. The week over week growth rate in the share of the total supply of the top 1,000 wallets has changed by -0.02%; as for the share of the total supply owned by exchange wallets within the top 1,000 wallets, that has changed by 0.14%.

How Much Development is Occurring?

The last activity date on Zilliqa’s GitHub repository was October 25, 2019, or about 1 days ago. Growth rates for open issues — a “”to-do list”” of sorts and watchers (“”subscribers”” following a code repository) for Zilliqa are growing by 0.33 and 1.53, respectively, over the past 30 days.

The Latest on Zilliqa and Social Media

If you are interested in following Zilliqa on social media, Twitter, where it has 66,316 following it, may be a good place to start. You can follow Zilliqa on Twitter here.

Where to Buy

You can trade Zilliqa, listed under the symbol ZIL, through the following exchanges: Gate, Yobit, Binance, DDEX, Ethfinex.

Article by SixJupiter
